Text: I appreciate all your work in uploading these. It's really great. However, it would be nice if you can go back and seed some of the Voyager discs. People aren't seeding and your torrents are dying. Several of your torrents get stuck before they reach 100%. Please seed them. I will continute to seed all the ones I have at least 10 times. Thank you!
